name.description: The name of the model if provided by the user. If not provided, it will be auto-generated.

moda-version.description: version of moda. The moda version includes fabrication and hardware related constraints.

author.description: unique id for the user that created the design. If user did not login, this is blank

referrer-uri.description: unique uri/url, capturing where the user came to the visualizer from

design-width-inches.description: the design width, specified by the user in inches.

design-height-inches.description: the design height, specified by the user in inches.

selected_pattern.description: the selected pattern, as an integer to select from a list.

selected_material.description: the selected material, as an integer to select from a list.

panels.description: The panel elements of the model.

length.description: The length identifier for the panel.

transform.description: The transformation matrix for the panel.

material.description: The material identifier for the panel.
